identity.name: Dishcovery
identity.vibe: Modern Cookbook Editorial x Swiss Utility

usage.headings: Playfair Display (Serif) - Use for H1, H2, H3. Weights: 600/700. Tracking: tight.
usage.body: DM Sans (Sans) - Use for paragraphs, UI elements, buttons. Weights: 400/500.
usage.accents: DM Sans - Uppercase, tracking-widest for labels (e.g., 'VEGAN', '15 MIN').

colors.description: A base of warm 'Oat Milk' cream, grounded by deep 'Norwegian Forest' sage green, with 'Paprika' orange accents for appetite appeal.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 or Gap-8 for grids.
layout.radius: 1rem (rounded-2xl) or 1.5rem (rounded-3xl) for a softer, organic feel.
layout.container: Max-width-7xl, centered, but with asymmetric internal layouts.
rules: Never center text in recipe cards; keep it left-aligned for readability.
Use aspect-ratio-square or aspect-[4/5] for food images.
Avoid full-width buttons; use pill-shaped buttons with generous padding.

components.buttons: Pill-shaped (rounded-full). Primary: Sage Green. Secondary: Outline with Sage text.
components.cards: Minimalist. White background, subtle shadow-sm, large image area (60% height).
components.inputs: Deep cream background, no border, bottom-border only focus state (Underline style) OR large rounded-full search bars.
components.navigation: Floating bottom bar on mobile, clean top nav on desktop with serif logo.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle 'noise' opacity-5 overlay to the background to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavy blur (backdrop-blur-xl) for sticky headers/navs with high transparency (bg-white/60).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Extend the theme with the colors provided above. Do not just copy-paste; integrate them into the 'extend' object.
2. IMPORT FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to the top of 'index.css'.
3. APPLY GLOBAL STYLES: Set 'font-family: DM Sans, sans-serif' on the body. Create a utility class '.font-serif' for 'Playfair Display'.
4. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Update the CSS variables in 'index.css' (root and dark) to match the HSL values provided in the 'colors' section.
5. CREATE LAYOUTS: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Recipe Results page. Mix wide cards (hero recipe) with tall cards (vertical lists).
6. USE IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Do not use gray boxes.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards) has a 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'search-input', 'recipe-card-0').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. No default blue/purple gradients.
Use 2-3x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover lift, scale, color shift).
Do not center-align everything. Use strong left alignment for text.
